article.title: Kongsberg Defence to Support Remotely Operated Weapon Station for U.S. Army
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Common Remotely Operated Weapon Station II

article.text: Kongsberg Defence and Aerospace AS, Kongsberg, Norway, was awarded a $9,620,730 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 52 spare parts in support of the Common Remotely Operated Weapon Station II. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
